name: Pizza Delivery Boy
description:
Pizza delivery boy - Become a pizza delivery BOY in virtual reality !!!



You are a pizza delivery company in your city remember that customers are waiting for an order
if they do not deliver on time they will cancel the order and you will lose money !!!

- You start the game by collecting orders from customers

- Then you make the pizza remember not to mistake what the customer ordered

- Take the pizza and deliver it to the address indicated

- if everything is ok you will earn money if you do not lose it

The game is about making as much money as possible
